ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Gammarus fasciatus 4.5 mg/l/96 hr @ 21 째C (95% confidence limit 3.5-5.8 mg/l), mature. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical, 98.6%/

LC50 Pteronarcys 0.34 mg/l/96 hr @ 15 째C (95% confidence limit 0.24-0.47 mg/l), mature. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical, 98.6%/

LC50 Salmo gairdneri (Rainbow trout) 0.21 mg/l/96 hr @ 12 째C (95% confidence limit 0.16-0.29 mg/l), wt 1.6 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical, 98.6%/

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (Bluegill) 0.32 mg/l/96 hr @ 24 째C (95% confidence limit 0.19-0.53 mg/l), wt 1.0 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical, 98.6%/
